categories: Category:Star Wars: Episode III Revenge of the Sith actors

nodes.text: Scott Mewett was the actor who played Sateen Vestswe in Star Wars: Episode III Revenge of the Sith. During filming he "was required to stay calm, throw away the razor and grow my beard for all it was worth and attend several costume measurement sessions with the English tailor and his collection of fine English woollen cloths."

One of a number of Australian extras, his work on the film was over in a matter of weeks, nearly two years before the film's release. He currently works in horticulture and graphic design. He is known as Scott Mewett on Wookieepedia.
